snippet.title: Dunk Dunk - Trailer 1
snippet.description:
Dunk Dunk - A new 4 player sports party game

Dunk Dunk is an intense pick-up-and-play multiplayer action basketball indie game from Badgerhammer. Precise player controlled throwing & dunking, plus a unique stretchy block make for nail-bitingly tense matches.

Easy platform controls that even a granny can handle. Aim, pass, fient, shoot & dunk with full 360 degree arm control.  Master the block to save & score goals or even become a platform. 

Play alone, with a friend or a house full of friends. Dress up your mascots and dunk basketballs, balloons or even anvils in crazy locations from all over the universe like space stations, dinosaur parks and haunted houses. Dunk Dunk is basketball game like no other.

Coming soon to Nintendo Switch and PC.
